column4: [ALSA] What is the function of the AlsaMixer slider »Master Mono« compared with that of »Master«?
try it and see. I think most of the time it doesn't do anything, but I bet it's supposed to control mono-stereo mix for headphone listening
I am not happy with your answer. "I think" and "I bet" is not enough. I have tried to find that out myself, you know.
